turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to order some coffee for pick-up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get it from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted just a large whole milk caffe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm seeing several Peet's locations near you. Which one did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see. I think it's the one near 16th Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, that's a large caffe latte with whole milk on 16th avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've placed your order, it'll be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Have a nice coffee.
